reviewText: I love the series of these movies he has started.  I can't wait for the next one to it the market.

"Sometimes I wish I wasn't a judge." The next chapter in the saga of wild west judge John Goodnight (Perry). While out riding John sees a stagecoach under attack and kills the attackers. The survivor is a woman who John strikes up a quick friendship with. Little by little he finds out more about her, and she may not be who he thought. I have seen all three movies in this series. The first one was actually not that bad, but the others went downhill fast. I can't really complain to much because they are hallmark channel TV movies so there is a certain expectation with that. The movie is sometimes entertaining and sometimes very boring. If it was more consistent it would have been better but just when you get into it it slows way down and makes you lose interest. If you have seen the others then you might as well watch this one too, otherwise its really a movie for hardcore western fans only. Overall, the third movie in the series and the third best one. I give it a C.
Good dvd. Plays without a problem
Love the movie, Thank You

Excellent story & characters. Luke Perry is excellent. A+++
Great movie

I think the acting really made this movie. I'm a big fan of Luke Perry westerns - he was great as usual, but Ricky Schroeder was really impressive as well along with the heroine. Really enjoyed it, & it isn't your typical western story.
Love the Goodnight Series

You can't go wrong with a Luke Perry movie.  I really like the first of the Goodnight series best, but they are all good and my movie collection wouldn't be complete without all of them.  The movie arrived in a timely manner and in new condition.
Love most of Scott's movies and this is a good one, but not so much as some of the others.

I like the series of Good night for Justice. This one was fun and had a different twist to it.

I've really enjoyed this movie. I haven't had it very long however I have watched it many times. Good western with some comedy.  I also have The Pledge, and have ordered Goodnight For Justice. All of these are by Luke Perry.

Mary
I enjoyed all three of the Goodnight western films. Luke Perry's acting made Goodnight come alive! The choice of locations for filming was great! So Western buff's go for all 3 of these film!

If you are a Luke Perry fan then this is the show for you.  It is like the old westerns used to be and well worth watching over and over. Luke Perry plays the part of John William Goodnight extremely well. This is a wonderful family movie and enjoyable for the whole family.

Can't wait till Mr. Perry makes another"GOODNIGHT.."on the dvd features he talks of making another one. The young lady in this movie,Ms. Katharine Isabelle...was great. And it was very hard to keep your eyes off of her. I kept telling myself she reminds me of a child actor. I couldn't place the movie..right..so I checked out my movie collection & found her. It was back in 1991...a t.v.movie which starred the great CHARLES BRONSON..in.."YES VIRGINIA,THERE IS A SANTA CLAUS"...Ms. Isabelle was around ten years of age playing Richard "THE WALTONS"Thomas's daughter. She has growth up to be a beauitful young lady. Hope Mr. Perry brings her back again. She played up to Goodnight pretty good. Collect it ...only if you LOVE THE WESTERN...it's truly a good one...it's the 3th one so far. Thankyou-Jack
Bit of a disappointment as it wasn't as good as the first film Goodnight for Justice. Passed an hour or so but I wouldn't recommend it as a good buy. Could do better !.
I have watched all the others in this series, have yet to watch this one, but just knowing the others I will probably like this one also

A perfect movie for anyone who loves westerns.  Luke Perry is excellent in this movie.  He carries his character all the way to the end as a believable judge in the west.  Little Ricky Schroder shocked me as a bad guy, and really pulled it off.

I HAVE BEEN FOLLOWING THE GOODNIGHT FOR JUSTICE SERIES FOR THE LAST 3 YEARS AND FIND THEM VERY ENTERTAINING. THIS VERSION WAS MORE ACTION PACKED AND ENTERTAINING. I ENJOY THE SERIES BUT IT WOULD NOT BE FOR EVERYONE. IF YOU LIKE A GOOD, STRAIGHT FORWARD WESTERN YOU WILL ENJOY THIS MOVIE.
Awesome movie. We love Luke Perry and the series of Goodnight for Justice live up to his great actoring. Well worth the money. Love them.
WHAT A GREAT SERIES
